definition: head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: The main topic of the meeting was expected to be the political crisis in Zimbabwe.
sentences.chinese: 预计，这次首脑会议的主题是津巴布韦的政治危机。

sentences.english: Chinese Premier Li Peng attended the first Asia-Europe summit.
sentences.chinese: 李鹏总理出席了首届亚欧首脑会议。

sentences.english: Each year, the Commission selects key development themes relating to the World Summit.
sentences.chinese: 每年，与世界首脑会议有关系的委托选择键发展主题。

sentences.english: Many problems call for an immediate solution before the five-state summit is held in our city.
sentences.chinese: 五国首脑会议在我市召开前有很多问题需要立刻解决。

sentences.english: The two-day Greater Mekong Subregion summit begins Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 为期两天的大湄公河次区域首脑会议将于星期天开幕。

sentences.english: This is the consensus reached among member states at the UN Millenium Summit.
sentences.chinese: 这是各国在千年首脑会议上达成的共识。

sentences.english: But the diplomat said the summit meeting should not be affected.
sentences.chinese: 这位外交官同事表示首脑会议将不会受到影响。

sentences.english: We were then raised to the summit of the highest apostolate by the favour of the divine mercy.
sentences.chinese: 我们随后向首脑会议提出的最高牧灵的赞成神恩。

sentences.english: The shallowness of the summit's achievements has been brutally exposed.
sentences.chinese: 首脑会议那些微薄的成果，残忍地暴露出来。

sentences.english: He may personally participate in summit conferences .
What the summit has brought out is the multisectoral approach.
sentences.chinese: 首脑会议产生的成果就是多部门办法。

definition: G7, the group of 7 industrialized countries: US, Japan, Britain, Germany, France, Italy and Canada (now G8, including Russia)
African Union (AU), abbr. for 非洲聯盟|非洲联盟
G8 (group of eight major industrialized nations)
Arab League, regional organization of Arab states in Southwest Asia, and North and Northeast Africa, officially called the League of Arab States
